overview: A fast-talking pitchman working the con-games on the streets, works himself up into an executive position of a large department store, with the aide of his shill, Mae. But the owner, Elmer Woods, of the department store has a blonde-beauty daughter, Peggy, who goes to work on him.
tagline: Mile-a-minute fun with JAMES DUNN giving the town the works!
title: Come Closer, Folks
